00018 #include <stdio.h>
00019 
00020 #include "scene.hpp"
00021 #include "StIter.hpp"
00022 
00023 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00024 {
00025         //process command line parameters
00026         if (argc==1) { 
00027                 printf("Usage: %s filename.sce [number_of_iterations [number_of_samples_per_light [power%% importance%%]]]\n", argv[0]); }
00028         else {
00029                 //! Total number of iterations
00030                 long nIteration = 3000000;
00031                 if (argc>2) nIteration=atol(argv[2]);
00032 
00033                 //! samples per lightsources
00034                 long samples = 2;
00035                 if (argc>3) samples=atol(argv[3]);
00036 
00037                 float power=0.8f;
00038                 float importance=0.1f;
00039                 if (argc>5) {
00040                         power=(float)(atol(argv[4])/100.0f);
00041                         importance=(float)(atol(argv[5])/100.0f);
00042                 }
00043 
00044 
00045         //Load the scene
00046                 Scene scene(argv[1], samples);
00047 
00048         //Initialize the rendering algorithm
00049                 StIter stiter(&scene, nIteration, power, importance);
00050 
00051         //Render the scene using Stochastic Iteration
00052                 stiter.render();
00053 
00054         //Save the result
00055                 stiter.saveImage();
00056         }
00057         return 0;
00058 }
